availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert McMillian (Bourbon County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace)

body.p: Bourbon County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace. Clark County, Kentucky, native. Son of William McMillian and Sarah Elizabeth Frame McMillian. Married to Matilda Berkley in Clark County, Kentucky, on March 30, 1837. Father of Anna E. McMillian Talbott, William H. McMillian, and Robert S. McMillian. Married to Armilda Starks in Bourbon County on December 9, 1846. Father of John T. McMillian, Sarah J. McMillian, and Nancy McMillian. Married to Rarhema McMillian in Bourbon County on December 20, 1859. Farmer in Bourbon County in 1850. Owned five enslaved persons in Bourbon County in 1850. Justice of the peace in Bourbon County in 1861.
